title: The Face of Analia
resume: El Rostro de Analía is a Spanish-language telenovela produced by the American-based television network Telemundo. It stars Elizabeth Gutiérrez, Martin Karpan, Maritza Rodríguez and Gabriel Porras, with the special appearance of Gaby Espino.
character: Ana Lucía "Analía" Moncada / Mariana Andrade de Montiel
